name: Scuffy Suspension
description:
Scuffy Suspension.. A Beautiful Game Inspired By Hill Climb Racing. Scuffy Suspension is a game about getting to the end with enough petrol/gas and you need to complete the 6 maps, because i only made 6 maps..

Also The Wheels Are Very Scuffed, They Fall Apart When You Go To Fast But I'm Keeping It, I Need Some Suspension

Anyway This Game Is For The Barjam Winter 2021 And I Guess You Could Say It's A Remake Of My First Game But In 2D.

Level Info:

Level 1:

Level 1 Was Made Just For A Nice Simple Test, get the petrol and get to the end

Level 2: 

The Design For Level 2 Was A Bit Weird, I Wanted To Make Everything A Bit More Challenging But The Wheels Keep Getting Some Type Of Stroke Everytime I Did Steep Hills And Stuff Like This, I Kept This Part Of The Map Cause It Is Accessable To Easily Get Across, If you are a pro gamer ofc

Level 3: 

Level 3 Was Half a failiure, In Most Of The Map You Can See The Grass Inside The Terrain, I Don't Know How To Fix This So I Just Left It, But Also The Old Mesh Still Works So I Got Insanely Confused, I Didn't Bother Fixing It Though Due To Time.

Level 4: 

To Make Level 4 More Interesting, I Only Put 1 Fuel Tank In The Entire Map, And Bumped Up The Fuel Usage So You Have To Be Pretty Careful When Using Your Fuel, I Have Done This For The Maps After Level 4 Because I Want A Goal Change For The Other Maps.

Level 5: 

if you are smart, you don't need a description for level 5, it's just half of level 4.

Level  6: 

For Level 6 There Are A Few More Ramps But That's All It Is Apart From The One Petrol Can.

Credits: 

Game Art: Mobile - Hill Climb Racing - Everything - The Spriters Resource

Gamejam: https://itch.io/jam/barjam-winter
